show.subtitle: KPFA.org commercial-free podcasts are completely listener sponsored! Please make a contribution at kpfa.org! "Guns & Butter" investigates the relationships among capitalism, militarism and politics. Maintaining a radical perspective in the aftermath of the September 11th attacks, "Guns & Butter: The Economics of Politics" reports on who wins and who loses when the economic resources of civil society are diverted toward global corporatization, war, and the furtherance of a national security state.Produced and hosted by Bonnie Faulkner.E-mail Bonnie at faulkner@gunsandbutter.org - KPFA Radio Berkeley CA, the first listener sponsored radio station in the USA.>
show.title: Guns and Butter
